items.sentence: I should be studying French, but it\'s more fun hanging out with you guys.
Tom would probably be disappointed if we didn\'t go to his birthday party.
If Tom had been speaking French, I would have been able to understand him.
Tom agrees that Mary should do most of the driving on their upcoming trip.
Tom always seems to be very busy and doesn\'t seem to have much free time.
I still think it\'s unlikely that we\'ll ever find someone to replace Tom.
What is important is seldom urgent and what is urgent is seldom important.
Mary isn\'t as beautiful as her sister, but she\'s still quite attractive.
I\'d like to go through just one day without being told I need to grow up.
Tom said he didn\'t know that Mary wasn\'t able to speak French very well.
